title: Inu-Ou
synopsis: Inu-Ou is born with unique physical characteristics, and the horrified adults cover every inch of his body with garments, including a mask on his face. One day, he meets a boy named Tomona, a blind biwa player, and as Tomona plays a delicate song of tangled fate, Inu-Ou discovers an incredible ability to dance.
staff: [['Yuasa, Masaaki', ['Director']], ['Kimura, Eriko', ['Sound Director']], ['Nogi, Akiko', ['Script']], ['Matsumoto, Taiyou', ['Original Character Design']]]
